notesStmt.note: Grier asserts that this note was "almost certainly" composed in 1857 (Walt Whitman: Notebooks and Unpublished Manuscripts, ed. Edward F. Grier [New York: New York University Press, 1984], 5:1977).

body.head: British in China
body.ab: Hong Kong (Elias Pierson tells me) is an island, something like sStaten Island in size—Of this the British have exclusive possession, and have fortified it, and keep regiments of soldiers there
